entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 1:00 PM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
